Package index

All functions

fct_arithmetic_mean()
Calculate emissions based on arithmetic means
fct_calc_res()
Calculate median and confidence interval based on Monte Carlo Simulations
fct_check_data2()
Check that the app's input data meet the template criteria.
fct_combine_mcs_E()
Generate and propagate Monte Carlo Simulations based on a template input file.
fct_combine_mcs_ER()
Combine MCS of emissions from Reference and monitoring period into emission reductions
fct_combine_mcs_P()
Combine MCS of emissions to a defined time period
fct_combine_mcs_cstock()
Generate and propagate Monte Carlo Simulations based on a template input file.
fct_forestplot()
Make a forest plot to show Monte Carlo simulation results
fct_histogram()
Generate histogram to show the simulations at any stage.
fct_make_formula()
Check that the app's the input data has matching land uses and correct carbon pools and associated factors.
fct_make_mcs()
Generate Monte Carlo Simulations for a given PDF
fct_round()
Reproduce round function from MS Excel
shiny_run_mocaredd()
Run Monte Carlo for REDD+ uncertainty's shiny app
